idea:
AssessHub is an assessment science and predictive analytics platform to help companies hire, train and retain “The Right” talent. The platform provides customised assessment for each role and level within an organisation. The core value is to assess individuals for job relevant skills and predict their on the job performance. 

The assessments are spread across functional, technical, cognitive and behavioural assessment and are delivered in a mobile first gamified environment. AssessHub’s technology platform enables companies to conduct assessments online without any human intervention in a proctored environment.  

The platform helps companies reduce the cost of bad hires, improve selection ration and reduces time to hire great talent. Once hired companies can utilised the platform to develop and promote talent. There are multiple tools like chatbots, video interviewing, job specific simulations and game based assessment automates the entire process and makes it highly interactive and engaging for the user. 

The talent analytics at the back end uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to analyse multiple data points and creates a success profile that helps companies make intelligent talent decision. 

Areas of Assessments:
1.     Hiring - Behavioural, Functional, Technical, Domain, Cognitive and Language Skills 
2.     Training need analysis and Training effectiveness assessments
3.     Virtual Assessment Development Centres (Competencies based) 
4.     Identifying HIPO’s - 9box grid (Performance v/s potential )
5.     Feedback 360 for employee development 

1 Million+ Assessments Delivered | 100+ Customers | 14 Countries
